Events & Catering
/$
$
Elevate your expectations for Naples event venues – with a view! Limon Rooftop Bar accommodates a variety of gatherings, from large group reservations in the lounge or rooftop terrace to private social and corporate events.
/$
$
CATERING & EVENTS MENU
/$
/$
$
$
$

Private Party Venue
/$
$
Come up with your guest list – then come up to Limon for cocktail parties, holiday gatherings, social get-togethers and other private events in our downtown Naples rooftop venue.
